summary: This bill, the Promoting American Competition in Aquaculture Research Act, aims to amend the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977. It seeks to eliminate the prohibition on indirect costs associated with aquaculture assistance programs and reauthorizes these programs with a funding of $15,000,000 for each fiscal year from 2026 to 2030. The bill also clarifies how limitations on indirect costs will apply to these awards.
